channel.title: Lecture 2 on MLOps: Operationalizing Machine Learning

item.title: Lecture 2 - Serverless Deployments
item.description: A. TLDR Models do not need to be complex, but it can be complex to deploy models. - Ben Weber (2020) Problem We have to take care of provisioning and server maintenance while deploying our models. We have to worry about scale: would 1 server be enough? How to minimize the time to deploy (at an acceptable increase in cost)? How can a single developer or data science/analytics professional manage a complex service?
